downtown.translation[0].definitions[0].d: to or in the centre or main business area of a town or city
downtown.translation[0].definitions[0].e: I have to go downtown later.
downtown.translation[1].definitions[0].d: the downtown area of a city is the main business district where many shops and offices are located
downtown.translation[1].definitions[0].e: We have about 100 personnel in our downtown San Diego office.
